review: We are really enjoying our Amazon Fire TV Stick!  We moved our Apple TV to our bedroom and put the Amazon Fire Stick in the living room.  It is very user friendly and the setup was very easy!

review: Purchased this device in March and have had nothing but problems with it.  I am now in the process of returning it and purchasing a Roku in its place.  I own 2 Roku's  for other tv's in my home, but wanted to give the fire stick a try. Don't waste your time or money! It's a horrible device!As for Amazon's customer service and return policies... Awesome!
